system.description:
The Priest is able to perform minor miracles as long as they keep their faith. They gain the Minor Miracle Ability.

Each time the Priest uses a Miracle Ability they can’t do so it any more. Once at the start of each day they make a prayer and make a DT 25 SPI ATTRIBUTE TEST which can’t be modified in any other way, on a success they can use miracles again. They can repeat the Test each following day where they reduce the DT by 5 until they succeed. Alternatively if the Priest Character acts well within their believes or played well the GM may grant them the Miracle again without rolling.
